definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to hold in one's hands/classifier for a double handful/Taiwan pr. [ju2]

sentences.english: It really likes playing games and looks charmingly naïve.
sentences.chinese: 這真的喜歡玩遊戲和看憨態可掬。

sentences.english: With an air of charming naivety, the panda is the most popular star in zoo.
sentences.chinese: 憨態可掬的大熊貓是動物園中最受歡迎的明星。

sentences.english: One cute fish can bring us pure happiness.
sentences.chinese: 一尾憨態可掬的金魚，能帶給我們純粹的歡愉。
